description: This file defines the IUserSettings interface within the WPEFramework project, including the nested INotification interface. It specifies methods for handling user settings such as audio description, preferred languages, captions, and privacy mode, along with notification callbacks for changes in these settings. It serves as a contract for implementing user settings management and notifications in the system.

classes.name: IUserSettings
classes.description: Interface for managing user settings and their notifications within the WPEFramework exchange module.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: Nested interface for receiving notifications about user setting changes, such as audio description, languages, captions, and privacy mode.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback object to receive user setting change notifications.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback.

methods.name: SetAudioDescription
methods.description: Enables or disables audio description setting.

methods.name: GetAudioDescription
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the audio description setting.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Sets the list of preferred audio languages in ISO 639-2/B codes.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Sets the presentation language using a full BCP 47 language tag.

methods.name: GetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Retrieves the current presentation language setting.

methods.name: SetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Sets preferred captions languages as a comma-separated list.

methods.name: GetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred captions languages.

methods.name: SetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Sets the preferred closed captioning service (e.g., 'CC3').

methods.name: GetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Retrieves the current preferred closed captioning service.

methods.name: SetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Sets the privacy mode, such as sharing or not sharing data.

methods.name: GetPrivacyMode
methods.description: Gets the current privacy mode setting.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
